welcome.title: Welcome to adding a new record
welcome.content:
On this page you can add (create) a new record.
Adding a new record is divided into 4 main steps:
Step 1: Introduction
Step 2: Submission form
Step 3: Review
Step 4: Publish

introduction.title: Adding a new record: Introduction
introduction.content: “Introduction” contains a short summary about the selected record type and brief instructions on how to submit the information.

submissionForm.title: Adding a new record: Submission form
submissionForm.content:
Complete the fields in the “Submission form”.
Note: Fields marked with a red asterisk (*) are mandatory. Some fields have descriptive text to assist you with the completion of the form.

saveDraft.title: Save a  Draft
saveDraft.content:
It is recommended to save your record periodically during the submission process.
You can also save the record as a draft and continue your submission at a later date.
Note: Once your draft is saved, you will then be able to share it by email or export to PDF.

review.title: Adding a new record: Review
review.content:
Once you have filled out the submission form, click here to review it.
If the mandatory fields were not completed, the “Review” will highlight them. Make sure to complete them in order to proceed to publishing your record.

publish.title: Publish
publish.content: Click on “Publish” to complete the process.

needHelp.title: Need help?
needHelp.content: Click here to access contextual help where you can find more information related to the submission process.

needMoreHelp.title: Need more help?
needMoreHelp.content: Us the Chat feature to message us for additional support.
